alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 21 at 2:24AM CST until January 22 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of one quarter to one half inch. * WHERE...Portions of western Arkansas. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Monday.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County
